function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Absence of onsite electricity generation and storage units","Impact":"Low flexibility and storage scores, hindering the building's ability to adapt to changing energy needs.","Mitigation":"Integration of onsite electricity generation and storage units to improve flexibility and storage scores.","Technologies":"Onsite electricity generation, energy storage units","People":"Occupants, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Building management"}]}
